altername_name: Hotel Deluxe: Greif nach den Sternen
Real Stories: Mon Hotel De Reve
name: Hotel Deluxe
overview: Your hotel, your style! Do you have what it takes to turn a small hotel into a star hotel where all the celebrities want to stay overnight? You are in charge: what will be the new style of your hotel? How do you organize the rooms and how do you want your staff to dress? Is there a wedding, fashion show or is there a VIP coming to your hotel? Keep everyone happy, and your hotel will automatically become the glamorous hotel! - Become a top executive with the ultimate goal of the 7-star Palace in Dubai. - Unique combination of simulation and styling. - Keep guests and staff happy. - Travel the world and discover beautiful environments. - Fully Dutch.
